joelib2.util.ghemical
Class GhemicalInterface

java.lang.Object
  joelib2.util.ghemical.GhemicalInterface

public class GhemicalInterface
extends Object

This interface class to Ghemical defines some native methods for accessing parts of the Ghemical functionality.

Author:
  • Jörg Kurt Wegner.
CVS Version:
Revision: 1.6Date: 2005/02/17 16:48:41source code (CVS head)

Method Detail

addOSNameToLibraryPath

public static void addOSNameToLibraryPath(boolean value)
Determines if the OS name (like 'windows' or 'linux') will be appended automatically to the library path. Default value is 'true'.

getOperationSystemName

public static String getOperationSystemName()

instance

public static GhemicalInterface instance()
Tries to create an instance of our interface class.

setLibraryName

public static void setLibraryName(String libraryName)
Sets the name of the OElib interface dynamic library. Note that the name can not be changed anymore after the first call to the 'instance()' method. The default library name is 'OE_jni', which should in almost all cases be ok.

setLibraryPath

public static void setLibraryPath(String libraryPath)
Sets the path to the OElib interface dynamic library. Note that the path can not be changed anymore after the first call to the 'instance()' method. The default library path is 'lib'.

addBond

public boolean addBond(int startBond,
                       int endBond,
                       int bondType)
Add ghemical bond.

Parameters:
startBond -
endBond -
bondType - 0=conjugated, 1=single, 2=double, 3=triple, 4=quadrupole
Returns:
boolean
